name: Product Badge Manager For Woocommerce
author: BoomDevs

sections.description:
Product Badge Manager For Woocommerce lets you create unlimited product badges and assign them to your WooCommerce product based on category, attributes, terms, popularity, sale, time, stocks, etc, and filter products archive using badges.

Free Features

  • Show Badge On Single Product Page
  • Show Badge On Product Catalog Pages
  • Assign Badge By Product Taxonomies
  • Assign Badge Based On Category
  • Assign Badge Based On Seller
  • Assign Badge Directly From Product
  • Floating Badge Top Of Product Image

pro Features

  • Show Badge On Single Product Page
  • Show Badge On Product Catalog Pages
  • Assign Badge By Product Taxonomies
  • Assign Badge Based On Category
  • Assign Badge Based On Seller
  • Assign Badge Directly From Product
  • Floating Badge Top Of Product Image
  • Assign Badge Based On Attributes
  • Assign Badge Based On Attributes Values
  • Assign Badge By Product Variations
  • Assign Badge Based On Time
  • Assign Badge Based On Sales
  • Assign Badge Based On Stock
  • Assign Badge Based On Rating
  • Assign Badge Based on Combination of Multiple Variation
  • Products Archive Based On Badge
  • Product Filtering Widget By Badge
  • Extendable Badge Shortcodes

Go Pro

View Demo

Privacy Policy

Product Badge Manager For Woocommerce collects some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

BoomDevs does not gather any data by default. The tracking SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

BoomDevs tracking SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how BoomDevs collects and uses this data.

üë• Tribute Testimonials ‚Äì WordPress Testimonial Grid/Slider üë•: Build any grid or slider layout using the drag-and-drop Testimonial Builder. Showcase positive feedback from satisfied customers and build trust with your audience.

üî≥ Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections üî≥: Unlock the full potential of Elementor with unlimited inner sections. Now, you can create and customize as many inner sections as you desire, giving you complete design freedom.

sections.installation:
There is no prerequisites for installing Product Badge Manager For WooCommerce plugin. You can follow the steps below to complete the installation.

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen from your WordPress website dashboard.
  2. Search for Product Badge Manager For WooCommerce.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it!

Manual Installation

  1. Download Product Badge Manager For WooCommerce plugin.
  2. Extract the product-badge-manager-for-woocommerce.zip file. You’ll get plugin files inside product-badge-manager-for-woocommerce directory.
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/product-badge-manager-for-woocommerce directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen form your WordPress website dashboard.
sections.faq:
Is it possible to use multiple badges for a product?

Yes,üòÉ it is possible.You can add as many badges as you wish with as many products you want.

Can I use a custom image for badges?

You can upload any kind of image to use as badge icon. We also provide free sets of vector badges with our pro version.

Does the Basic Version is Free for Lifetime?

Yes. The Basic version is free for a lifetime. But for more features, you can upgrade to the Pro version at any time.

Can I get premium support from you guys?

If you are a Pro user, you can get up to 12 months support from us through our dedicated support forum. You can get support at WordPress.org if you are a Basic user.
